spec.description: Configuration affecting service registry. See more details at: https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/networking/service-entry.html

addresses.description: The virtual IP addresses associated with the service.

endpoints.description: One or more endpoints associated with the service.

address.description: Address associated with the network endpoint without the port.

labels.description: One or more labels associated with the endpoint.

locality.description: The locality associated with the endpoint.

network.description: Network enables Istio to group endpoints resident in the same L3 domain/network.

ports.description: Set of ports associated with the endpoint.

serviceAccount.description: The service account associated with the workload if a sidecar is present in the workload.

weight.description: The load balancing weight associated with the endpoint.

exportTo.description: A list of namespaces to which this service is exported.

hosts.description: The hosts associated with the ServiceEntry.

location.description: Specify whether the service should be considered external to the mesh or part of the mesh.

ports.description: The ports associated with the external service.

number.description: A valid non-negative integer port number.

protocol.description: The protocol exposed on the port.

targetPort.description: The port number on the endpoint where the traffic will be received.

resolution.description: Service resolution mode for the hosts.

subjectAltNames.description: If specified, the proxy will verify that the server certificate's subject alternate name matches one of the specified values.

labels.description: One or more labels that indicate a specific set of pods/VMs on which the configuration should be applied.
